page.title: 061'st Hayle Guides.
page.content: 1'st Hayle Guides meet from seven- thirty on Fridays. At seven-thirty guides arrive.They play around until everyone is there. Then it's patrol time.Patrol time is when we split up into four groups Daffodil,White Rose,Orchid and Primrose to work or play. Later on they get together in one big group to play games,have quizzes or go for walks. At about quarter to nine they sing songs till we go home. Guides do many activeties like going to the beach,walks or barbecues.Guides have many badges to earn such as cooking and needlework. Guides also go on camp.They camp in fields or woods for weekends. This year we are celebrating seventy -five years of guiding.
